/help: lists all commands and their descriptions
/nextShiny: returns the next uncaught shiny pokemon
/add: adds a pokemon to the list of caught pokemon
/addShiny: adds a pokemon to the list of caught shiny pokemon
/remove: removes a pokemon from the list of caught pokemon
/removeShiny: removes a pokemon from the list of caught shiny pokemon
/listMissing: lists all missing pokemon to complete pokedex
/listMissingShiny: lists all missing shiny pokemon to complete shiny pokedex
/update: updates the database from the pokemon home save file
/status: shows the status of the android emulator
/claimPokemon: claims a pokemon for you (declares intent do catch)
/unClaimPokemon: unclaims a pokemon (clears intent do catch)
